Welcome to the Data Visualisation e-Portfolio. This resource demonstrates data visualisation skills through five tasks covering specification, theory, practice, and advanced animation techniques.

## Portfolio Overview

This portfolio demonstrates comprehensive understanding of data visualisation through systematic exploration of the Grammar of Graphics framework.

**Task 1: Planning a Graphic** - Learn to write specifications (SPECs) for reproducible visualisations

**Task 2: Grammar of Graphics** - Understand the theoretical foundation of all modern visualisations

**Task 3: Complex Graphics** - Create and analyse complex visualisations using real data

**Task 4: Animation** - Extend visualisations through time using animation techniques

**Task 5: Compiled Portfolio** - This website integrating all stages
